ValidationRule.description: TR Light Record Type can only be created if related Opportunity is aPrice Indication without quote. TR Record Type can only be created if related Opportunity is with quote creation.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT(ISBLANK( Opportunity__c)), OR(AND( Opportunity__r.RecordType.DeveloperName = "Opportunitywithquotecreations", RecordType.DeveloperName = "TechnicalRequirementLight"), AND(Opportunity__r.RecordType.DeveloperName = "PriceIndicationwithoutquote", RecordType.DeveloperName = "TechnicalRequirement")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot create this Technical requirement record type with the Opportunity type selected. Please select a different type.
